title: friend just gifted me and I can't tell what it was
body:
Title^

Basically i clicked yes too fast and i don't even remember if it was a mystery gift or a regular gift :(.

Please tell me Rito

thanks, 

much love from a person who plays too much league

hehe xd

replies.body: It looks like a very cool friend gifted you some RP!  Unfortunately, I can't really provide more specifics than that, being on a public forum and all.  Hope that's enough to clear things up, though!
